data.title: The Beast Must Die (1952 film)
data.meta_description: The Beast Must Die (Spanish La bestia debe morir) is a 1952 Argentine thriller film, which is directed by Romn Violy Barreto and stars Guillermo Battaglia, Narciso Ibez Menta and Warly Ceriani. It based on the novel The Beast must Die by Irish poet Nicholas Blake. A widowed children's author li
